data.content:
Senna (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Senna, the Redeemer, is a powerful marksman champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As a champion with a rich lore and captivating story, Senna has become a fan-favorite since her release. In this article, we will delve into the details of Senna's default skin, exploring its design, significance, and how it fits into her overall character arc.

The Story of Senna's

Costume

Senna's default skin represents her original appearance when she was first introduced to the game. It showcases her as a fierce and determined warrior, ready to fight against the forces of darkness. The skin features Senna wearing her iconic black and gold armor, adorned with intricate details and symbols that reflect her role as a sentinel of light.

The default skin perfectly captures Senna's essence as a champion. Her armor is designed to provide both protection and agility, allowing her to swiftly move across the battlefield while withstanding enemy attacks. The black and gold color scheme symbolizes her connection to the Shadow Isles, a dark and mysterious realm where she was held captive by Thresh, a malevolent spirit.

Senna's default skin also highlights her signature weapon, the relic cannon known as

This powerful firearm is infused with the souls of the condemned, allowing Senna to harness their energy and unleash devastating attacks on her enemies. The intricate details on the weapon, such as the glowing blue crystals and engraved runes, further emphasize its mystical nature.

Overall, Senna's default skin is a testament to her strength, resilience, and unwavering determination to bring light to the darkness. It serves as a visual representation of her journey from a captive to a powerful champion, ready to fight for justice and redemption.

Senna's Story and Role in League of Legends

Senna's story in League of Legends is a captivating tale of darkness, redemption, and the power of love. She was once a renowned sentinel of light, fighting alongside her husband, Lucian, to protect the innocent from the horrors of the Shadow Isles. However, during a mission to eradicate the malevolent spirits, Senna was captured by Thresh, a sadistic warden who imprisoned her soul within his lantern.

For years, Senna endured torment and despair within the lantern, her light slowly fading away. But her spirit remained unbroken, and she never lost hope. Eventually, she managed to forge a bond with the trapped souls within the lantern, using their energy to break free and reclaim her physical form.

Now reunited with Lucian, Senna fights alongside him once again, wielding her relic cannon to purge the world of darkness. As a marksman champion, Senna excels at dealing damage from a distance, utilizing her unique abilities to weaken and eliminate her foes. Her ultimate ability,

allows her to unleash a devastating wave of energy, damaging enemies and shielding her allies.

Senna's strengths lie in her ability to poke enemies from afar, providing valuable damage in team fights. Her passive ability,

allows her to collect mist from slain enemies, empowering her attacks and granting her bonus range. This mechanic rewards skilled positioning and strategic decision-making, making her a formidable force in the hands of an experienced player.

However, Senna also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her reliance on collecting mist to scale her power can be challenging in the early stages of the game, requiring careful farming and positioning to maximize her potential.

In the world of League of Legends, Senna holds a significant place as a symbol of hope and resilience. Her story resonates with players, reminding them of the power of love and the strength to overcome even the darkest of obstacles. With her default skin, players can embody the spirit of Senna, embracing her journey and fighting for justice on the Fields of Justice.

Explore Senna's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Senna and her various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. Discover the different skins available for Senna, each with its own unique design and theme. From the haunting

skin, there is a style to suit every player's taste.

Immerse yourself in Senna's world and witness her evolution as a champion. Experience the thrill of battling alongside Lucian, as they seek to bring light to the darkest corners of Runeterra. Senna's story is one of triumph over adversity, and her journey continues to inspire players around the world.

Senna (PROJECT: Senna)

RP Cost: 1820 RP | Release Date: August 1, 2020

PROJECT: Senna is a highly anticipated skin in the League of Legends universe. This futuristic and cybernetic-themed skin was released on August 1, 2020, and has quickly become a fan favorite. With its sleek design and unique visual effects, PROJECT: Senna offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

The PROJECT skin line is known for its high-tech aesthetics, featuring champions who have been augmented with cybernetic enhancements. Senna, the Redeemer, is no exception. In this skin, she is transformed into a cybernetic warrior, ready to fight against the forces of evil in the dystopian future of the League of Legends universe.

PROJECT: Senna features a complete visual overhaul, with new animations, particle effects, and sound effects. Her base model is replaced with a sleek, futuristic armor, complete with glowing neon accents. Her weapon, the relic cannon, is transformed into a high-tech energy rifle, emitting a vibrant blue energy with every shot.

One of the standout features of PROJECT: Senna is her recall animation. When recalling, Senna activates her holographic wings and hovers above the ground, surrounded by a swirling vortex of energy. This recall animation perfectly captures the futuristic and cybernetic theme of the skin, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

As a champion, Senna has a rich and captivating backstory. She was once a normal human, but after being captured by Thresh, she was trapped in his lantern for years. Eventually, she managed to escape with the help of Lucian, her husband, and became a powerful warrior seeking redemption and revenge.

In the game, Senna is a versatile marksman support who excels at dealing damage from a distance while providing utility to her team. Her passive ability, Absolution, allows her to collect Mist from enemy champions and minions, which she can then use to empower her attacks and abilities. Her Q ability, Piercing Darkness, fires a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies. Her W ability, Last Embrace, throws a spectral mist that roots enemies caught in its explosion. Her E ability, Curse of the Black Mist, grants her and her allies camouflage and movement speed. Finally, her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, fires a global beam of light that damages enemies and shields allies.

Senna's strengths lie in her long-range damage and utility. With her high attack range and ability to heal allies, she can poke enemies from a safe distance while keeping her team alive. Her crowd control abilities also make her a valuable asset in team fights, as she can root multiple enemies and provide a shield to protect her allies.

However, Senna also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her abilities have long cooldowns, so timing and positioning are crucial for maximizing her effectiveness in fights.

In the League of Legends lore, Senna plays a significant role in the ongoing battle between good and evil. As a member of the Sentinels of Light, she fights against the forces of darkness, seeking to rid the world of the Black Mist and its corrupting influence. Her story is intertwined with champions like Lucian, Thresh, and Viego, adding depth and complexity to the game's narrative.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Senna's appearances in the League of Legends universe. From her base skin to her various alternate skins, including PROJECT: Senna, you can explore the different visual and thematic interpretations of this iconic champion.

Senna: The Redeemer

Release Date: October 29, 2019

Within the mystical world of League of Legends, Senna stands as a beacon of hope and redemption. This ethereal marksman, released on October 29, 2019, brings a unique blend of ranged firepower and supportive abilities to the game. With a captivating backstory, a diverse skill set, and a significant impact on the game, Senna has quickly become a beloved champion among players.

The Story of Senna

Senna's tale is one of tragedy, sacrifice, and ultimate redemption. Once a renowned warrior of the Blessed Isles, she fought alongside her husband, Lucian, against the malevolent forces of the Black Mist. However, during a fateful encounter with Thresh, the Chain Warden, Senna was captured and trapped within his lantern for years.

During her imprisonment, Senna's soul was slowly consumed by the Black Mist, transforming her into a spectral being. Yet, she never lost her determination to escape and reunite with Lucian. Through sheer willpower and the guidance of the Sentinel of Light, Senna managed to break free from her spectral prison, emerging as a powerful and vengeful entity.

However, Senna's time in the lantern had changed her. She had become a living weapon, capable of harnessing the Black Mist's power against its own kind. With her newfound abilities, Senna now seeks to rid the world of the Black Mist and protect the innocent from its malevolence.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Senna's unique playstyle combines the traits of a traditional marksman with the utility of a support champion. Her primary strength lies in her long-ranged attacks, allowing her to safely deal damage from a distance. Additionally, her passive ability, Absolution, grants her bonus attack damage and range as she collects Mist from fallen enemies and allies.

One of Senna's defining features is her ability to heal and shield her allies. Her Q ability, Piercing Darkness, allows her to damage enemies while healing herself and her teammates. This ability can be a game-changer in team fights, providing sustain and protection to her allies.

Furthermore, Senna's W ability, Last Embrace, enables her to root enemies in place, setting up opportunities for her team to engage or disengage. This crowd control ability can be crucial in turning the tide of battles and catching opponents off guard.

However, Senna does have her weaknesses. Due to her reliance on scaling with Mist, she can have a slower start compared to other marksmen. Additionally, her lack of mobility makes her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Senna players must position themselves carefully and rely on their team for protection to maximize her potential.

Senna's Place in the Game

Senna's introduction to League of Legends brought a fresh dynamic to the bot lane. With her hybrid playstyle, she can be played as both a marksman and a support, offering versatility to team compositions. Her ability to heal and shield allies makes her an excellent choice for protecting fragile carries, while her damage output ensures she remains a threat throughout the game.

Furthermore, Senna's unique mechanic of collecting Mist and scaling with it adds an extra layer of strategy to her gameplay. Players must carefully balance farming, trading, and supporting to maximize her potential. This aspect of her kit makes her a rewarding champion for those who enjoy a more nuanced playstyle.

As Senna continues to establish herself within the League of Legends universe, her impact on the game and its lore is undeniable. Her story of redemption and her role as a symbol of hope resonates with players, making her a beloved champion within the community.

On our website, you can find comprehensive information about Senna, including videos showcasing all her skins. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or prefer the more extravagant skins, our page has you covered.

Join the ranks of the Sentinels of Light and experience the power of redemption with Senna, the Redeemer.

Senna (Lunar Eclipse Senna)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: January 9, 2020

Senna, the Redeemer, has been a beloved champion in League of Legends since her release in 2019. With her unique blend of ranged attacks and support abilities, she quickly became a favorite among players. To celebrate her popularity and add a touch of celestial beauty to her appearance, Riot Games introduced the

skin on January 9, 2020.

The Lunar Eclipse Senna skin is a stunning addition to Senna's wardrobe, transforming her into a celestial warrior. Clad in elegant armor adorned with lunar motifs, she radiates an otherworldly aura. Her weapon, the relic cannon, is also given a lunar makeover, with intricate designs and a mystical glow. The skin truly captures the essence of the moon's ethereal beauty.

But the Lunar Eclipse Senna skin is not just about visual enhancements. It also brings new animations and sound effects, further immersing players in the lunar theme. From her graceful movements to the celestial echoes of her abilities, every detail has been carefully crafted to enhance the player's experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Senna and her journey in League of Legends. Senna, originally known as Senna of the Lantern, was once a human, a skilled warrior who fought alongside her husband, Lucian. However, their lives took a tragic turn when they encountered Thresh, a sadistic and powerful specter. Thresh captured Senna's soul, imprisoning her within his lantern and leaving Lucian devastated.

For years, Senna's soul languished in darkness, until a miraculous event occurred. The Black Mist, a malevolent force that threatened to consume the world, weakened Thresh's hold on Senna. With her newfound strength, she shattered the lantern and emerged from her prison, forever changed. No longer fully human, Senna became a spectral being, wielding the relic cannon as her weapon of choice.

Now, Senna roams the world as the Redeemer, seeking to cleanse the Black Mist and free the souls trapped within. With her unique abilities, she can both deal damage from a distance and support her allies. Her passive, Absolution, allows her to collect Mist from slain enemies, empowering her attacks and granting her bonus range. Her Q ability, Piercing Darkness, fires a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies. Her W ability, Last Embrace, throws a spectral projectile that roots enemies in place. Her E ability, Curse of the Black Mist, envelops her in mist, granting her camouflage and movement speed. Finally, her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, unleashes a powerful beam of light that damages enemies and shields her allies.

Senna's strengths lie in her versatility and utility. She can deal significant damage from a safe distance, making her a formidable marksman. Additionally, her healing abilities and crowd control make her a valuable asset to any team. Her ability to provide vision with her E ability also grants her team strategic advantages. However, Senna's weaknesses lie in her fragility and lack of mobility. She relies on positioning and teamwork to survive in the heat of battle.

In the world of League of Legends, Senna has become an iconic champion, beloved by players for her unique gameplay and compelling story. With the introduction of the Lunar Eclipse Senna skin, players can now experience her in a whole new light, embracing the celestial beauty and power that she embodies.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Senna's appearances, including the Lunar Eclipse Senna skin. Explore her story, master her abilities, and join the ranks of those who fight for redemption and justice in the League of Legends.

Senna (Star Guardian Senna)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 10, 2020

The Star Guardian Senna skin was released on September 10, 2020, as part of the Star Guardian skin line in League of Legends. This skin allows players to transform Senna, the Redeemer, into a celestial warrior adorned in the iconic Star Guardian attire. With its stunning visual effects and thematic elements, the Star Guardian Senna skin offers a unique and captivating experience for players.

As a Star Guardian, Senna joins the ranks of other champions who have embraced the power of the stars to protect the universe from darkness. This skin features Senna in a beautiful, flowing white and gold outfit, complete with intricate details and celestial accents. Her weapon, the relic cannon, is transformed into a magical staff adorned with stars and crystals, radiating with cosmic energy.

The Star Guardian Senna skin also introduces new visual effects and animations. Her abilities are enhanced with vibrant colors and sparkling particles, creating a mesmerizing display of celestial power. From her Q ability, Piercing Darkness, to her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, every spell showcases the beauty and majesty of the stars.

Furthermore, the Star Guardian Senna skin includes unique recall animations and sound effects. When recalling, Senna is enveloped in a swirling vortex of stardust, symbolizing her connection to the cosmos. The recall animation is accompanied by a celestial melody, adding an extra touch of magic to the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story of Senna and her journey as a champion in League of Legends. Senna, originally known as Senna of the Lantern, was once a normal human being. She was a member of the Sentinels of Light, an order dedicated to fighting against the Black Mist and the undead horrors it unleashed.

However, Senna's life took a dark turn when she and her husband, Lucian, confronted the dreaded Thresh, a sadistic and powerful warden of souls. Thresh captured Senna's soul, imprisoning her within his lantern for years. During her time in captivity, Senna's spirit was tormented, but she never lost hope.

Eventually, Senna managed to escape her prison with the help of a mysterious ally. She emerged from the lantern, forever changed by her ordeal. No longer fully human, Senna became a spectral warrior, wielding the relic cannon as her weapon against the forces of darkness.

In the game, Senna is a versatile marksman support who excels at dealing damage while providing utility to her team. Her passive ability, Absolution, allows her to collect Mist from slain enemies, empowering her attacks and granting her bonus range. This unique mechanic makes Senna a formidable threat in the late game.

Senna's Q ability, Piercing Darkness, allows her to fire a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies. This ability can be crucial in team fights, as it provides sustain for her team while dealing damage to the enemy. Her W ability, Last Embrace, throws a spectral mist that roots enemies caught within its radius, setting up opportunities for her team to engage or disengage.

One of Senna's defining abilities is her E ability, Curse of the Black Mist. This ability allows her to transform into a wraith-like form, gaining movement speed and becoming untargetable. This can be used to escape dangerous situations or reposition during team fights. Additionally, Senna's ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, sends out a wave of energy that damages enemies and shields her allies, providing a powerful tool for turning the tide of battle.

Senna's strengths lie in her ability to deal consistent damage from a safe distance, while also providing utility and healing for her team. Her long-range attacks and crowd control abilities make her a valuable asset in team fights, allowing her to control the battlefield and protect her allies. However, Senna's weaknesses include her relatively low mobility and vulnerability to all-ins from aggressive champions.

In conclusion, the Star Guardian Senna skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically rich experience. With its celestial aesthetics, enhanced visual effects, and captivating recall animations, this skin truly embodies the essence of the Star Guardian universe. Whether you're a fan of Senna or simply appreciate the beauty of the Star Guardian skins, Star Guardian Senna is a must-have addition to your collection.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Senna's appearances, including the Star Guardian Senna skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Senna on the League of Legends website.

Senna (Bewitching Senna)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 29, 2020

Senna, the Redeemer, has always been a powerful and iconic champion in the world of League of Legends. With her haunting backstory and unique abilities, she has captured the hearts of players around the globe. And now, she has received a stunning new skin that perfectly captures her mystique and power - Bewitching Senna.

Released on October 29, 2020, Bewitching Senna is a 1350 RP skin that transforms Senna into a bewitching sorceress. With her dark and enchanting appearance, this skin is a must-have for any Senna main or collector of League of Legends skins.

The Bewitching Senna skin features a complete visual overhaul for the champion, giving her a new outfit, animations, and spell effects. Senna is adorned in a flowing black and purple robe, adorned with intricate golden details. Her hair is styled in an elegant updo, and her eyes glow with an otherworldly purple hue. The skin also includes new particle effects for her abilities, adding an extra touch of magic to her attacks.

But the beauty of Bewitching Senna is not just skin deep. The skin also comes with a unique recall animation, where Senna conjures a swirling vortex of magic to transport herself back to base. This attention to detail and the addition of unique animations make the skin truly stand out and add to the overall experience of playing as Bewitching Senna.

Now, let's delve into the story of Senna and how she came to be the powerful champion she is today. Senna was once a renowned sentinel of light, fighting alongside her husband Lucian to rid the world of the Black Mist. However, during a fateful battle, she was captured by Thresh, a sadistic and powerful warden of souls. For years, Senna was trapped within Thresh's lantern, her soul tormented and her light dimmed.

But Senna's story does not end there. Through sheer willpower and the help of a mysterious ally, she managed to escape her prison and return to the world of the living. However, her time in the lantern had changed her. Senna emerged as a powerful and vengeful warrior, wielding both her own light and the black mist that had once consumed her.

In the game, Senna is a versatile marksman support who excels at dealing damage from a distance while providing utility to her team. Her passive ability, Absolution, allows her to collect mist from enemy champions and minions, empowering her basic attacks and granting her bonus range. Her Q ability, Piercing Darkness, fires a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies. Her W ability, Last Embrace, throws a spectral lantern that roots enemies caught in its explosion. Her E ability, Curse of the Black Mist, allows her to transform into a wraith-like form, gaining movement speed and camouflaging her allies. And finally, her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, sends forth a wave of light that damages enemies and shields her allies.

Senna's unique playstyle and abilities make her a popular pick in both professional play and solo queue. Her long-range damage and utility make her a valuable asset to any team composition, and her ability to scale into the late game makes her a formidable force to be reckoned with.

If you want to learn more about Senna and her various appearances in League of Legends, you can find more information and videos on her champion page. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or the new Bewitching Senna skin, there's no denying the impact she has had on the game and the hearts of players worldwide.

Senna (True Damage Senna)

RP Cost: 1350 | Release Date: November 10, 2019

True Damage Senna is a stunning skin that showcases the powerful and stylish side of the iconic League of Legends champion, Senna. Released on November 10, 2019, this skin is part of the True Damage skin line, which features a group of champions who are part of a virtual hip-hop band. True Damage Senna brings a fresh and unique look to the champion, combining her signature ethereal aesthetic with a modern streetwear vibe.

True Damage Senna is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin that offers a significant visual upgrade to the base champion. With its intricate details, vibrant colors, and sleek design, this skin is a must-have for Senna enthusiasts and collectors alike.

The Story of True Damage Senna

In the alternate universe of True Damage, Senna takes on a new persona as a member of the virtual hip-hop group. True Damage is a band formed by a group of talented champions, each bringing their unique style and skills to the stage. Senna, known for her haunting beauty and deadly precision, becomes the embodiment of elegance and power in True Damage Senna.

True Damage Senna's costume features a mix of futuristic elements and urban streetwear. She wears a sleek black bodysuit adorned with intricate gold patterns, representing her connection to the ethereal realm. The outfit is complemented by a stylish cropped jacket, fingerless gloves, and high-top sneakers, giving her a modern and edgy look.

One of the most striking aspects of True Damage Senna is her weapon, a massive golden cannon that exudes power and style. The cannon is intricately designed, with glowing accents and futuristic details, reflecting Senna's mastery of both the physical and spiritual realms. As she unleashes her abilities, the cannon pulses with energy, leaving a trail of vibrant colors in its wake.

Overall, True Damage Senna's costume perfectly captures the essence of the True Damage skin line, blending the futuristic and urban aesthetics to create a visually stunning and unique look for the champion.

Senna: The Redeemer

Senna, also known as the Redeemer, is a complex and compelling champion in the world of League of Legends. She was once a renowned sentinel of light, fighting against the darkness that threatened to consume the world. However, during a mission to destroy the Black Mist, Senna was captured by Thresh, a sadistic and powerful warden of souls.

For years, Senna was trapped within Thresh's lantern, her soul tormented and her light dimmed. But she never lost hope. With the help of Lucian, her husband and fellow champion, Senna managed to escape her prison and return to the world of the living.

Now, Senna wields her newfound powers as a weapon against the forces of darkness. She is a marksman support hybrid, capable of dealing devastating damage from a distance while providing utility and protection to her allies. Senna's abilities revolve around her unique weapon, a relic cannon that harnesses the souls of the fallen to empower her attacks.

As a champion, Senna excels in long-range engagements, using her abilities to poke down enemies and provide crowd control. Her passive ability, Absolution, allows her to collect mist from slain enemies, increasing her attack range and granting her bonus attack damage. This mechanic rewards Senna for actively participating in fights and helps her scale into the late game.

Senna's Q ability, Piercing Darkness, fires a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies. This ability allows her to sustain herself and her teammates during skirmishes, making her a valuable asset in team fights. Her W ability, Last Embrace, throws a spectral lantern that roots enemies caught in its explosion, providing crowd control and setting up plays for her team.

One of Senna's most iconic abilities is her E ability, Curse of the Black Mist. This ability envelops Senna and her allies in a shroud of mist, granting them camouflage and movement speed. It also allows Senna to pass through terrain, making her a slippery and elusive target. Finally, her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, sends forth a wave of light that damages enemies and shields her allies, turning the tide of battle in her team's favor.

Senna's unique playstyle and versatile kit make her a popular pick in both professional play and solo queue. Her ability to deal damage while providing utility and protection to her team makes her a valuable asset in any composition.

Discover Senna's Many Appearances

If you want to explore more about Senna and her various appearances, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information, videos, and images of all the different skins available for Senna, including the stunning True Damage Senna skin. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or want to see her in a different light, we've got you covered.

So, dive into the world of Senna and discover the many facets of this captivating champion. From her haunting beauty to her unwavering determination, Senna is a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.

Senna (Prestige Lunar Eclipse Senna)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points

Release Date: January 2021

Senna, the Redeemer, has captivated the hearts of League of Legends players since her introduction to the game. With her haunting backstory and unique gameplay mechanics, she quickly became a fan favorite. Now, Senna receives a stunning new skin, the

which adds a touch of celestial beauty to her already captivating presence on the Rift.

The Prestige Lunar Eclipse Senna skin is a limited edition skin that can only be obtained through the use of Prestige Points. These points are earned by participating in various events and completing missions within the game. With its release in January 2021, players have the opportunity to add this exclusive skin to their collection and showcase their dedication to the game.

As with all Prestige skins, the Lunar Eclipse Senna skin features a unique color palette and visual effects that set it apart from the base skin. Senna's armor is adorned with intricate lunar patterns, reflecting the celestial theme of the skin. Her weapon, the relic cannon, is transformed into a radiant lunar artifact, emitting a soft glow as she unleashes her devastating attacks.

One of the most striking aspects of the Prestige Lunar Eclipse Senna skin is the addition of ethereal wings. These wings, reminiscent of a lunar eclipse, give Senna an otherworldly presence on the battlefield. As she moves gracefully across the map, her wings shimmer and leave a trail of stardust in her wake.

Furthermore, the skin introduces new animations and sound effects that enhance the overall experience of playing as Senna. Her abilities are accompanied by celestial sound cues, immersing players in the cosmic atmosphere of the skin. The attention to detail in the Prestige Lunar Eclipse Senna skin truly showcases the dedication of the design team in creating a visually stunning and immersive experience for players.

Now, let's delve into the story of Senna, the Redeemer, and explore her journey within the League of Legends universe. Senna's tale is one of tragedy, redemption, and unwavering determination.

Senna was once a renowned sentinel of light, fighting alongside her husband, Lucian, against the forces of darkness. However, during a mission to eradicate the Black Mist, Senna was captured by Thresh, a sadistic and powerful warden of souls. For years, she was trapped within his lantern, her soul tormented and her light extinguished.

But Senna's spirit remained unbroken. She clung to her memories of Lucian and her duty as a sentinel, refusing to succumb to the darkness. Eventually, she managed to escape Thresh's lantern, forever changed by her time in captivity.

Now freed from her prison, Senna wields the very essence of the Black Mist as a weapon against the forces of evil. She has become a symbol of hope and redemption, seeking to rid the world of the darkness that once consumed her. With her relic cannon and unwavering resolve, Senna fights alongside her husband once again, determined to bring light to the darkest corners of Runeterra.

In the game, Senna is a versatile marksman support who excels at providing utility and damage from a safe distance. Her passive ability, Absolution, allows her to collect Mist from slain enemies, empowering her attacks and granting her bonus range. This unique mechanic rewards Senna players for actively participating in combat and provides scaling power as the game progresses.

Senna's Q ability, Piercing Darkness, allows her to heal allies and damage enemies in a straight line. This ability can be crucial in team fights, as it provides sustain for her team while simultaneously weakening the enemy. Her W ability, Last Embrace, roots enemies caught within its area of effect, setting up opportunities for her team to engage or disengage from fights.

One of Senna's defining abilities is her E ability, Curse of the Black Mist. This ability allows her to temporarily transform into mist, granting her camouflage and bonus movement speed. This unique mobility tool enables Senna to reposition herself and her team, making her a valuable asset in both offensive and defensive situations.

Finally, Senna's ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, unleashes a powerful beam of light that damages enemies and shields allies. This global ultimate can turn the tide of a battle, providing much-needed protection for her team or securing crucial kills on the enemy side.

Senna's strengths lie in her ability to provide consistent damage from a safe distance, while also offering utility and healing to her team. Her long-range attacks and crowd control abilities make her a formidable force in team fights, allowing her to dictate the flow of battle. Additionally, her passive ability grants her scaling power throughout the game, making her a potent late-game carry.

However, Senna also has her weaknesses. Her low base attack damage and attack speed can make last-hitting minions challenging in the early game. Additionally, her reliance on collecting Mist to scale her power can be a double-edged sword, as falling behind in farm or kills can hinder her effectiveness. Senna's lack of mobility also makes her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage.

In conclusion, Senna's Prestige Lunar Eclipse skin is a visually stunning addition to her repertoire. With its celestial theme, unique visual effects, and immersive sound design, the skin offers players a chance to experience Senna in a whole new light. Whether you're a fan of her tragic backstory, her versatile gameplay, or simply appreciate the beauty of the skin, the Prestige Lunar Eclipse Senna is a must-have for any dedicated League of Legends player.

For more information about Senna and her various appearances, including the Prestige Lunar Eclipse skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the hero. Watch videos, explore her lore, and discover the many facets of this captivating champion.

Senna (High Noon Senna)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 6, 2020

Senna, the Redeemer, has received a stunning new skin in the world of League of Legends - High Noon Senna. This skin, released on August 6, 2020, brings a whole new level of dark and mysterious aesthetic to the champion. With its intricate details and thematic elements, High Noon Senna is a must-have for any fan of the champion.

High Noon Senna is priced at 1350 RP, making it a moderately priced skin. It offers a range of visual and audio enhancements that truly bring the character to life in the High Noon universe. Let's dive into the details of this captivating skin.

High Noon Senna: A Dark and Mysterious Transformation

High Noon Senna takes the champion to the wild west, where she becomes a gunslinger with a haunting presence. The skin features a unique model, new animations, and spell effects that perfectly capture the essence of the High Noon theme.

Senna's base model is transformed into a fierce and determined gunslinger. She wears a long, tattered coat with intricate patterns and a wide-brimmed hat that casts a shadow over her face. Her weapon of choice is a massive rifle, adorned with ornate engravings and a glowing barrel. The attention to detail in the skin is truly remarkable, with every aspect carefully crafted to create a sense of mystery and danger.

Not only does High Noon Senna have a visually stunning model, but it also features new animations that add to the overall theme. Her recall animation, for example, shows Senna summoning a spectral horse before disappearing into a cloud of smoke. These small details make the skin feel alive and immersive.

In addition to the visual enhancements, High Noon Senna also brings new spell effects to the table. Her abilities now have a distinct western flair, with bullets and smoke trails accompanying her attacks. The sound effects have also been modified to match the theme, further enhancing the overall experience of playing as High Noon Senna.

Senna: The Redeemer's Journey

Senna, originally known as Senna of the Lantern, has a rich and captivating story within the world of League of Legends. She was once a normal human, married to Lucian, another champion in the game. However, their lives took a dark turn when they encountered Thresh, a sadistic and powerful warden of souls.

Thresh captured Senna's soul and trapped it within his lantern, leaving Lucian devastated. But Senna's story doesn't end there. After years of torment, she managed to break free from Thresh's grasp, emerging as a powerful and vengeful entity known as the Redeemer.

Senna wields a relic weapon called the Black Mist, which she uses to fight against the darkness that threatens to consume the world. She is a ranged support marksman, capable of dealing damage from a distance while also providing utility to her team. Her abilities revolve around her connection to the Black Mist, allowing her to harness its power to heal allies and trap enemies.

In the game, Senna is often played as a bot lane support, providing protection and utility to her ADC (Attack Damage Carry) while also dealing damage to the enemy team. Her long-range abilities and crowd control make her a formidable force in team fights, and her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, can turn the tide of battle with its massive heal and damage potential.

Despite her strengths, Senna also has weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, her reliance on scaling and itemization means that she may have a weaker early game compared to other champions.

Overall, Senna is a complex and intriguing champion with a unique playstyle. Her story, combined with her gameplay mechanics, has made her a fan favorite in the League of Legends community.

Senna (Prestige True Damage Senna)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points

Release Date: November 10, 2020

Senna, the Redeemer, has been a beloved champion in League of Legends since her release in 2019. With her unique blend of ranged attacks and support abilities, she quickly became a favorite among players. Now, Senna is getting a stunning new skin called

that is sure to turn heads on the Rift.

The Prestige True Damage Senna skin is a special edition skin that can only be obtained through the Prestige Points system. Players can acquire this skin by collecting 100 Prestige Points and exchanging them for the skin. This exclusive skin was released on November 10, 2020, and has since become a highly sought-after cosmetic item.

True Damage is a virtual hip-hop group within the League of Legends universe, consisting of champions Akali, Ekko, Qiyana, Senna, and Yasuo. The Prestige True Damage Senna skin is a collaboration between Riot Games and Louis Vuitton, the luxury fashion brand that designed the outfits for the True Damage group. This skin showcases Senna in a sleek and stylish new look, with a black and gold color scheme that exudes elegance and power.

The Prestige True Damage Senna skin features several unique visual and audio effects that make it stand out from other skins. Senna's abilities have been reimagined with a futuristic twist, incorporating holographic elements and high-tech animations. Her auto attacks now emit a golden glow, while her Q ability, Piercing Darkness, creates a trail of golden particles as it travels through enemies. Additionally, her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, unleashes a stunning display of golden energy that engulfs her allies and damages her enemies.

Not only does the Prestige True Damage Senna skin offer a visually stunning experience, but it also comes with exclusive recall and emote animations. The recall animation shows Senna surrounded by a holographic stage, reminiscent of True Damage's performances, while the emote animation allows Senna to strike a pose with her signature weapon, the relic cannon.

Now, let's delve into the story of Senna and her place in the League of Legends universe. Senna, originally known as Senna of the Lantern, was once a normal human being until she was captured by Thresh, the Chain Warden. Thresh imprisoned her soul within his lantern, torturing her for years. However, Senna's spirit remained unbroken, and she eventually escaped with the help of Lucian, her husband.

After her escape, Senna returned to the Shadow Isles, seeking revenge against Thresh and the other dark entities that plagued the land. She became a relentless hunter of the undead, using her newfound powers to purify and protect the living. Senna's abilities as the Redeemer allow her to channel the mist of the Shadow Isles into her relic cannon, granting her the ability to banish evil and heal her allies.

In the game, Senna is primarily played as a marksman support, providing both damage and utility to her team. Her passive ability, Absolution, allows her to collect Mist from enemy champions and minions, empowering her attacks and granting her bonus range. Senna's Q ability, Piercing Darkness, fires a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies. Her W ability, Last Embrace, throws a spectral lantern that roots enemies caught within its explosion. Senna's E ability, Curse of the Black Mist, cloaks her and her allies in mist, granting them camouflage and movement speed. Finally, her ultimate ability, Dawning Shadow, sends forth a wave of mist that damages enemies and shields allies.

Senna's strengths lie in her long-range poke, healing capabilities, and crowd control. Her ability to deal damage while providing utility makes her a versatile pick in both solo queue and professional play. However, Senna's weaknesses include her low mobility and vulnerability to all-ins from aggressive champions. She relies heavily on positioning and teamwork to maximize her effectiveness.

Overall, Senna's story and gameplay make her a compelling and powerful champion in the League of Legends universe. Whether you're a fan of her lore or enjoy her playstyle, Senna offers a unique and rewarding experience on the Rift.

For more information about Senna and her various appearances, including the Prestige True Damage Senna skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website and watch videos showcasing her abilities and animations. Senna's journey as the Redeemer continues to captivate players, and her presence in the game is a testament to the rich storytelling and diverse gameplay that League of Legends has to offer.
